about_the_game:
LoveXLust VR" DLC takes your sexperience to the next dimension—literally. Slip on your Oculus VR headset and step into a world where every moan, every gasp, and every teasing touch feels closer than ever. Enjoy the pleasures of the main game in immersive VR, where you can see, hear, and feel your partners like never before. Experiment with a tempting selection of toys to push boundaries and bring them to the ultimate climax.

  • Experience all the content of the main game in a new vivid way

  • Use all the available toys to penetrate intuitively in VR

  • Hear the moans of your partners as they react to your every touch

Ready to indulge? LoveXLust VR is waiting to take your sexperience to new heights!

(This DLC requires an Oculus VR headset. Enjoy all the main game content in VR!)

Explore Your Fantasies with Beautiful Partners!

In the mesmerizing world of LoveXLust VR, you're free to choose from an array of stunning companions who possess alluring bodies. Each character is crafted to cater to your every desire, ensuring that no matter which one you select, they will leave you breathless with pleasure. From the sultry seductress to the playful tease. Immerse yourself in their world and experience intimate encounters!

A Treasure Trove of Sex Toys!

Unlock your deepest pleasures with our vast collection of sex toys. With an assortment of classic vibrators, dildos, strap-ons, and more, you're sure to find the perfect tool for unleashing your wildest fantasies. These sex toys will take your companions pleasure to new heights.

Explore the World in Style!

Embark on a sensual journey through various locations that cater to every desire and fantasy imaginable. From the cozy comfort of an onsen to the wild indulgence of a party van LoveXLust VR offers variety of possibilities for your erotic escapades. Experience intimate encounters in any position you desire thanks to our library of positions, ensuring that no two experiences are ever alike.

Control Your Desires with Intuitive Gameplay!

With intuitive controls designed for players of all skill levels, navigating LovexLust VR is a breeze. Experiment with different locations and sex positions for an unforgettable experience that caters to every kink and fantasy imaginable! So what are you waiting for? Dive into LoveXLust VR today and explore the depths of your own desires like never before!

content_descriptors.notes: LoveXLust aim to provide an immersive and authentic experience for players that includes mature content, such as consensual sexual acts between adult characters and depictions of revealed genitalia within the context of consensual sexual encounters, all with a focus on consent and respect. This game is entirely a work of fiction, any names, locations, or events showing in this game are fictitious. Characters appearing in this game are over the age of 18.

name: LoveXLust VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i7 7000 series
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR Meta Quest 2, OpenXR Meta Quest 3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i7 10700 series
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 2070
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR Meta Quest 2, OpenXR Meta Quest 3

short_description: Welcome to LoveXLust VR, where your sexperience becomes more immersive than ever. Feel every touch, hear every moan, and indulge in pleasure like never before.
